Welcome to the site of the Modern Applied Data Analysis (MADA) Course.
This course is an online course taught as EPID/BIOS 8060 in Fall 2019 at the University of Georgia by [Andreas Handel](http://handelgroup.uga.edu/).

This website contains all the course information. Most materials are hosted on this site, some are on external sites and either linked or embedded from here.

For students taking this course at UGA, additional materials (e.g. online quizzes) are provided on the eLC, UGA's course software.
